entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as he is walking towards his cabin and later when Harry approaches the fence.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang is described as charging around the corner to welcome Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned throughout the passage as he walks towards Hagrid's cabin and interacts with him.

relationships.description: Hagrid welcomes Harry to his cabin.
Fang charges around the corner and almost bowls Harry over with enthusiasm, indicating that Fang welcomed Harry.
